description: '''Nero''' (stylised as '''NERO''') are a British electronic music trio composed of members Dan Stephens, Joe Ray and Alana Watson. On 12 August 2011, they released their debut studio album, ''[[Welcome Reality]]'', which reached number one in the [[UK Albums Chart]]. In August 2012, "[[Promises (Nero song)|Promises]]" received a Gold certification in the United States. On 10 February 2013, Nero won a [[Grammy Award]] for their collaborative remix of "Promises" with [[Skrillex]]. Their second studio album, ''[[Between II Worlds]]'', was released on 11 September 2015.
